Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-44905 affecting package hdf5 for versions less than 1.14.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-44905 affecting package hdf5 for versions less than 1.14.6-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package hdf5 is earlier than 1.14.6-1, affected by CVE-2025-44905
